Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.CbH9UMxgrmEr8tFh]{Personal Plasmas Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.I2ulORBcKU6kkakv]{Advanced Plasmas Proficiency}

Benefits

When performing a waveshot attack the Reflex Saving Throw TN is increased to [TN18]. When performing a gridshot attack, the character may choose to change its area of effect in one of the following ways:
• Change the area of effect to a 5’-by-10’ area, and increase
the Reflex Saving throw TN to [TN22]
• Change the area of effect to a 10’-by-20’ area, and decrease
the Reflex Saving Throw TN to [TN14]
system.summary: TN 18 Reflex save for waveshot, modify waveshot attack AOE
